Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Garfield due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Garfield due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #90 Harlem |Temporary Southbound Reroute near North Blvd/Forest Blvd
ShortDescription: Southbound 90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem : due to, street blockage near North Blvd/Forest Blvd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #90 Harlem buses are temporarily rerouted via Harlem, Randolph, Marion, South Blvd and Harlem : due to, street blockage near North Blvd/Forest Blvd.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stetson/Randolph
ShortDescription: NB  #6 Jackson Park Exp buses are rrtd via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, Wacker, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound  #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, Wacker, then resume their normal route (take layover on Wacker between Columbus and Michigan) due to street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
